attributes.action: NHS - Keep Routine Health Checks For The Elderly This Winter
attributes.additional_details: We're either protecting the elderly or we're not. The elderly are most vulnerable during winter. Many are alone and depend upon routine health checks for their wellbeing.
attributes.background: Keep routine health checks for the elderly 75+ during booster vaccinations

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Changes to NHS operations to increase capacity to deliver the Covid-19 booster programme are an operational matter for the NHS, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament.

You can read more about these changes here: https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/publication/jcvi-advice-in-response-to-the-emergence-of-the-b-1-1-529-omicron-variant-next-steps-for-deployment/
